# DAMASK — the Düsseldorf Advanced Material Simulation Kit

https://doi.org/10.1016/j.commatsci.2018.04.030
https://damask3.mpie.de

### This is my first contribution to spack, I hope I have not overlooked anything important.

### Are alpha versions considered at all?
DAMASK 3.0 introduces many changes over DAMASK 2.0.3 and despite labelled alpha, it is already in better shape than the 2.0 release branch. We just don't want to release a version 3.0 and figure out a month later that a breaking change is required.

### Reasons for submitting 4 packages 
- split packages to have minimal dependencies (especially for py-damask, which would even run on Windows)
- metapackage (BundledPackage) to get everything together
- the same structure is used for [deb](https://launchpad.net/~eisenforschung/+archive/ubuntu/damask), [rpm](https://build.opensuse.org/repositories/home:MarDieh/damask), [Conda](https://github.com/conda-forge/damask-feedstock), and pacman (under development).
title: new package(s): DAMASK
